mapper.select: select OnelineComment.id, writerId, content, regDate, memberId, m.image from OnelineComment left join Member as m on m.id = OnelineComment.memberid where onelineId = #{param1} and commentId is null order by regDate asc
select * from OnelineComment left join Member as m on m.id = OnelineComment.memberid where commentId = #{param1} order by regDate asc
select count(id) from OnelineComment where futureDiaryId = #{param1}
mapper.update: update OnelineComment set content = #{content} where id=#{id}
